body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos! My name is Russell Long. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Russell, my name is Marilyn Jones.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marilyn! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for some information about a car I recently saw on your website.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help with that. Could you please provide me with the model name or number of the car you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's the Vincenzo Grandio, model number three three four two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marilyn. And just to confirm, could you also provide me with your email address so I can send you more information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! It's marilyn.jones@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I've got that down. Lastly, may I have a contact number to reach you if we have special offers on the Vincenzo Grandio?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you very much for that information, Marilyn. A representative will follow up with details on the Vincenzo Grandio. Thank you for your time and have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Russell Long and the customer's name is Marilyn Jones.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
